Key Match Events: Chris Sale won his major league-leading 15th game with six crisp innings.
Jorge Soler homered early and threw out a runner at the plate late.
Olson doubled to center, Ozuna scored.
Laureano singled to right, Olson scored, Laureano to second.
Williams doubled to left, Murphy scored and Arcia scored.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Braves beat skidding Twins 5-1 for 3-game sweep.
The game was held at Target Field in Minneapolis, Minnesota with an attendance of 19,142.
The game lasted 2 hours and 39 minutes.
